traits.Aggressive: As a bonus action, the anarch can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature it can see.
traits.Siege Monster: The anarch deals double damage to objects and structures.

actions.Spiked Club: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) piercing damage if used with two hands.
